verses.verse: Then Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Go <S%H935><s%> in unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and tell <S%H1696><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%>, Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, that they may serve me <S%H5647><s%>.
For if thou refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let them go <S%H7971><s%>, and wilt hold them still <S%H2388><s%>,

behold <S%H3027><s%>, the hand of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> upon thy cattle <S%H4735><s%> which are in the field <S%H7704><s%>, upon the horses <S%H5483><s%>, upon the asses <S%H2543><s%>, upon the camels <S%H1581><s%>, upon the herds <S%H1241><s%>, and upon the flocks <S%H6629><s%>: there shall be a very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3515><s%> murrain <S%H1698><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall make a distinction <S%H6395><s%> between the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and there shall nothing <S%H1697><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> of all that belongeth to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> appointed <S%H7760><s%> a set time <S%H4150><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, To-morrow <S%H4279><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that thing <S%H1697><s%> on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>; and all the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>; but of the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> not one <S%H259><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%>, and <S%H259><s%>, behold, there was not so much as one of the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%>. But the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was stubborn <S%H3513><s%>, and he did not let the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> to you handfuls <S%H2651><s%> of ashes <S%H6368><s%> of the furnace <S%H3536><s%>, and let Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> it toward heaven <S%H8064><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.

And it shall become small dust <S%H80><s%> over all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and shall be a boil <S%H7822><s%> breaking forth <S%H6524><s%> with blains <S%H76><s%> upon man <S%H120><s%> and upon beast <S%H929><s%>, throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> ashes <S%H6368><s%> of the furnace <S%H3536><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> it up toward heaven <S%H8064><s%>; and it became a boil <S%H7822><s%> breaking forth <S%H6524><s%> with blains <S%H76><s%> upon man <S%H120><s%> and upon beast <S%H929><s%>.

And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the boils <S%H7822><s%>; for the boils <S%H7822><s%> were upon the magicians <S%H2748><s%>, and upon all the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and he hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not unto them <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Rise up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%>, Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, that they may serve me <S%H5647><s%>.

For I will this time <S%H6471><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> all my plagues <S%H4046><s%> upon thy heart <S%H3820><s%>, and upon thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, and upon thy people <S%H5971><s%>; that thou mayest know <S%H3045><s%> that there is none like me in all the earth <S%H776><s%>.

For now I had put forth <S%H7971><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%>, and smitten <S%H5221><s%> thee and thy people <S%H5971><s%> with pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, and thou hadst been cut off <S%H3582><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>:

but in very <S%H199><s%> deed <S%H5668><s%> for this cause have I made thee to stand <S%H5975><s%>, to show <S%H7200><s%> thee my power <S%H3581><s%>, and that my name <S%H8034><s%> may be declared <S%H5608><s%> throughout all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
As yet exaltest <S%H5549><s%> thou thyself against my people <S%H5971><s%>, that thou wilt not let them go <S%H7971><s%>?

Behold <S%H4279><s%>, to-morrow about this time <S%H6256><s%> I will cause it to rain <S%H4305><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3515><s%> hail <S%H1259><s%>, such as hath not been <S%H3644><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> the day it was founded even until now <S%H3117><s%>.

Now therefore send <S%H7971><s%>, hasten <S%H5756><s%> in thy cattle <S%H4735><s%> and all that thou hast in the field <S%H7704><s%>; for every man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> that shall be found <S%H4672><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and shall not be brought <S%H622><s%> home <S%H1004><s%>, the hail <S%H1259><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> upon them <S%H4191><s%>, and they shall die.

He that feared <S%H3373><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> among the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> made his servants <S%H5650><s%> and his cattle <S%H4735><s%> flee <S%H5127><s%> into the houses <S%H1004><s%>:
and he that regarded <S%H7760><s%> not the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> and his cattle <S%H4735><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Stretch forth <S%H5186><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%> toward heaven <S%H8064><s%>, that there may be hail <S%H1259><s%> in all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, upon man <S%H120><s%>, and upon beast <S%H929><s%>, and upon every herb <S%H6212><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, throughout the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%> toward heaven <S%H8064><s%>: and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H5414><s%> thunder <S%H6963><s%> and hail <S%H1259><s%>, and fire <S%H784><s%> ran down <S%H1980><s%> unto the earth <S%H776><s%>; and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> rained <S%H4305><s%> hail <S%H1259><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

So there was hail <S%H1259><s%>, and fire <S%H784><s%> mingled <S%H8432><s%> with the hail <S%H1259><s%>, very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3515><s%>, such as had not been <S%H3808><s%> in all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> since it became a nation <S%H1471><s%>.

And the hail <S%H1259><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all that was in the field <S%H7704><s%>, both man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>; and the hail <S%H1259><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> every herb <S%H6212><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and brake <S%H7665><s%> every tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>.
Only in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>, where the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were <S%H1259><s%>, was there no hail.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2398><s%>, I have sinned this time <S%H6471><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%>, and I and my people <S%H5971><s%> are wicked <S%H7563><s%>.

Entreat <S%H6279><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; for there hath been enough <S%H7227><s%> of these mighty <S%H430><s%> thunderings <S%H6963><s%> and hail <S%H1259><s%>; and I will let you go <S%H7971><s%>, and ye shall stay <S%H5975><s%> no longer <S%H3254><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3318><s%>, As soon as I am gone out of the city <S%H5892><s%>, I will spread abroad <S%H6566><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; the thunders <S%H6963><s%> shall cease <S%H2308><s%>, neither shall there be any more hail <S%H1259><s%>; that thou mayest know <S%H3045><s%> that the earth <S%H776><s%> is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s.
But as for thee and thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, I know <S%H3045><s%> that ye will not yet fear <S%H3372><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%>.
And the flax <S%H6594><s%> and the barley <S%H8184><s%> were smitten <S%H5221><s%>: for the barley <S%H8184><s%> was in the ear <S%H24><s%>, and the flax <S%H6594><s%> was in bloom <S%H1392><s%>.
But the wheat <S%H2406><s%> and the spelt <S%H3698><s%> were not smitten <S%H5221><s%>: for they <S%H2007><s%> were not grown up <S%H648><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and spread abroad <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and the thunders <S%H6963><s%> and hail <S%H1259><s%> ceased <S%H2308><s%>, and the rain <S%H4306><s%> was not poured <S%H5413><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the rain <S%H4306><s%> and the hail <S%H1259><s%> and the thunders <S%H6963><s%> were ceased <S%H2308><s%>, he sinned <S%H2398><s%> yet more <S%H3254><s%>, and hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%>, he and his servants <S%H5650><s%>.

And the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was hardened <S%H2388><s%>, and he did not let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
